headline: Citigroup (NYSE:C) Appoints Jonathan Moulds As Non-Executive Director To Oversee Risk Management
summary: Citigroup (NYSE:C) recently appointed Jonathan Moulds as a Non-Executive Director, enhancing its leadership with significant industry expertise. This, along with other notable executive appointments during the last quarter, added credibility to the company's strategic direction and governance. As Citigroup's share price rose by 9% over the last quarter, the broader market also saw a similar trend with a 9.9% increase over the past year. The company's successful strategies, substantial...

headline: A $6.5 Trillion ‘Triple Witching’ Heralds Return to Volatility
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Investors are bracing for $6.5 trillion of notional US options expiring on Friday, in a move that could free stocks to swing more wildly than the subdued changes seen in recent weeks.Most Read from BloombergSecurity Concerns Hit Some of the World’s ‘Most Livable Cities’JFK AirTrain Cuts Fares 50% This Summer to Lure Riders Off RoadsTaser-Maker Axon Triggers a NIMBY Backlash in its HometownHow E-Scooters Conquered (Most of) EuropeNYC Congestion Toll Cuts Manhattan Gridlock by 25%,
